name: CVE-2021-25957
description: In “Dolibarr” application, v2.8.1 to v13.0.2 are vulnerable to account takeover via password reset functionality. A low privileged attacker can reset the password of any user in the application using the password reset link the user received through email when requested for a forgotten password.

external_references.description: This object was created using cve2stix from the Signals Corps.
